powder.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a dry substance in the form of very small grains
powder.translation[0].definitions[0].not: milk/custard etc powder (=a powder that you add water to in order to change it into a liquid)
powder.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Grind the sugar into a powder.
The paint is supplied in powder form.
powder.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a type of powder that you put on your face in order to make it look smoother and to give it more colour

powder.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to put powder on something, especially your skin
